author: Jake Trent
summary: Wrote a tutorial about writing unit tests for ReasonML code. He uses bindings with Jest, so everything should be familiar to you.

author: Jared Palmer
summary: Reason React is supported by his Razzle SSR framework. It is a zero-configuration based packaging solution for your universal JS app.
